about_the_game:
Here is a package of Dark Fantasy-themed assets that are absolutely perfect for Explorative-Platformer types of action games!
This can be used together with the FREE explorative-platformer sample project TRIDOME, which we released earlier, to turn it into a dark fantasy setting!

Some of the highlights of this asset pack includes:
・Map chips and backgrounds designed around the feel of a demonic castle and prisons.
・A hero character using a whip to take out enemies.

・Bat-like standard trash mobs and vampires as bosses.
・Map transitional gimmick assets such as doors
・Gimmicks like flamethrower turrets and grappling points to swing over obstacles.

・Objects like candle stands, barrels, keys, and recovery items.
・Large objects such as Goddess statue or magical orbs fitting to be assigned as save points, warp points, etc.
A great collection of dark, but elegant things exactly you would expect in a demon castle!

You are free to modify the assets in this pack as you see fit to make the game as you need it to be to make your own original explorative-platformer game!

【File Save Location】
・The downloaded asset files can be found in the dlc folder under the directory where Pixel Game Maker MV is installed.

【How to Import Assets】
１．Run Pixel Game Maker MV, and open the project file you wish to import the assets into.
２. Select the “Scene” tab around the center left window.
３. Under scene tab you will find Scene List being displayed. Right click inside Scene List to open up the right click menu and you will find the option “Import Scene”. Select it to open the file browser.
４. Navigate to the location as written in File Save Location above, and select file ".pgmexport" to open.
５. A scene sample containing the asset sets, pictures and objects will be imported.
